allocateOptions(address,address,uint256,.details: Skipped if the optionsPurchaseQueue doesn't exist

params.optionAllocation: is the maximum % of options to allocate towards the purchase queue (will only allocate  up to the amount that is on the queue)
params.optionsAmount: is the amount of options minted

returns.allocatedOptions: is the amount of options that ended up getting allocated to the OptionsPurchaseQueue

params.currentOption: is the address of the current option
params.gammaController: is the address of the opyn controller contract

returns._0: amount of collateral redeemed by burning otokens

params.auctionSellOrder: is the sell order of the bid
params.counterpartyThetaVault: is the address of the counterparty theta vault of this delta vault
params.gnosisEasyAuction: is the address of the gnosis auction contract holding custody to the funds

params.closeParams: is the struct with details on previous option and strike selection details
params.vaultParams: is the struct with vault general data
params.vaultState: is the struct with vault accounting state

returns.delta: is the delta of the new option
returns.otokenAddress: is the address of the new option
returns.strikePrice: is the strike price of the new option

params.depositAmount: is the amount of collateral to deposit
params.gammaController: is the address of the opyn controller contract
params.marginPool: is the address of the opyn margin contract which holds the collateral
params.oTokenAddress: is the address of the otoken to mint

params.gnosisEasyAuction: The address of the Gnosis Easy Auction contract

params.bidDetails: is the struct with all the details of the bid including the auction's id and how much to bid

params.params: is the rollover parameters passed to compute the next state
params.vaultState: is the storage variable vaultState passed from RibbonVault

returns.mintShares: is the amount of shares to mint from deposits
returns.newLockedAmount: is the amount of funds to allocate for the new round
returns.newPricePerShare: is the price per share of the new round
returns.performanceFeeInAsset: is the performance fee charged by vault
returns.queuedWithdrawAmount: is the amount of funds set aside for withdrawal
returns.totalVaultFee: is the total amount of fee charged by vault

sellOptionsToQueue(address,address,uint2.details: Reverts if the auction hasn't settled yet

params.gnosisEasyAuction: The address of the Gnosis Easy Auction contract

returns._0: totalPremiums Total premiums earnt by the vault

params.asset: is the address of the vault's asset
params.gammaController: is the address of the opyn controller contract
params.oldOption: is the address of the old option

returns._0: amount of asset received by exercising the option

params.gammaController: is the address of the opyn controller contract

returns._0: amount of collateral redeemed from the vault

params.auctionDetails: is the struct with all the custom parameters of the auction

returns._0: the auction id of the newly created auction

params._vaultParams: is the struct with vault general data
params.feeRecipient: is the address to recieve vault performance and management fees
params.owner: is the owner of the vault with critical permissions
params.tokenName: is the name of the token
params.tokenSymbol: is the symbol of the token

allocateOptions(address,address,uint256,.notice: Allocates the vault's minted options to the OptionsPurchaseQueue contract

burnOtokens(address,address).notice: Burn the remaining oTokens left over from auction. Currently this implementation is simple. It burns oTokens from the most recent vault opened by the contract. This assumes that the contract will only have a single vault open at any given time.

claimAuctionOtokens(Vault.AuctionSellOrd.notice: Claims the oTokens belonging to the vault

commitAndClose(VaultLifecycle.CloseParam.notice: Sets the next option the vault will be shorting, and calculates its premium for the auction

createShort(address,address,address,uint.notice: Creates the actual Opyn short position by depositing collateral and minting otokens

getAuctionSettlementPrice(address,uint25.notice: Gets the settlement price of a settled auction

placeBid(GnosisAuction.BidDetails).notice: Places a bid in an auction

rollover(Vault.VaultState storage,VaultL.notice: Calculate the shares to mint, new price per share, and amount of funds to re-allocate as collateral for the new round

sellOptionsToQueue(address,address,uint2.notice: Sell the allocated options to the purchase queue post auction settlement

settleLong(address,address,address).notice: Exercises the ITM option using existing long otoken position. Currently this implementation is simple. It calls the `Redeem` action to claim the payout.

settleShort(address).notice: Close the existing short otoken position. Currently this implementation is simple. It closes the most recent vault opened by the contract. This assumes that the contract will only have a single vault open at any given time. Since calling `_closeShort` deletes vaults by calling SettleVault action, this assumption should hold.

verifyInitializerParams(address,address,.notice: Verify the constructor params satisfy requirements
